name: Vyaktitva
description:
Vyaktitva offers advisory services in organizational capability building with special focus on integrating business strategy to individual performance. It is not left to chance to arrive at the desired outcome, rather success is a certainty. Because we have all the sides of the dice covered - whichever facet the intervention needs – creative conceptualization (Envisionment), building ownership (Energizing), developing skills (Enabling), hardcore implementation (Execution), or institutionalizing (Evaluation, Enhancement, Establishing) – someone in the team brings that in as their strong suit.
 “Vyakti” or person merges with “tatva” or the natural elements to form “Vyaktitva” which means one’s own true character or individuality. Like the five fingers close into the powerful fist, the five natural elements together give form to the sixth, the human element. Our organic entity, our vyaktitva is an orchestral convergence of wisps of the sky, puffs of air, clods of earth, drops of water and flames of fire.
features: Co-creating Fractal Structures for Scaling with Soul
Building Real Ownership amongst Senior Leaders
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: By unfolding the true elements of people and organizations we help businesses create sustainable impactful change.
ShortDescription: Vyaktitva offers advisory services in organizational capability building with special focus on integrating business strategy to individual performance.

Highlights.name: Designing an Adaptive Culture
Highlights.description: Culture is the Fundamental System that drives behaviour. Since Organizational performance is determined by how people respond & react to stimulus, getting the ‘right’ lived-culture is vital to performance. In that sense getting the required lived-culture in line with strategy enables the execution of the desired strategy.

Highlights.name: Building Real Ownership amongst Senior Leaders
Highlights.description: The world is highly dynamic and windows of opportunity are short. The only edge is agility coupled with collaborative and inclusive decision making. The strategy comes down to ensuring the senior leaders with the largest canopies of control are operating with each other with superior levels of Trust, Alignment, Capability and Joyful Resilience.

Highlights.name: Executive Coaching
Highlights.description: At its essence the intent of coaching is to help a high performing individul create deep sustainble change within themselves, by themselves, since that is the difference that takes the individual and their performance from good to great, and makes it sustainable. From our own personal experience we know – its easier said than done.

enhanced_description: Vyaktitva offers comprehensive advisory services focused on organizational capability building, specifically integrating business strategy with individual performance to ensure sustainable and impactful change. By unfolding the true elements of people and organizations, Vyaktitva helps businesses achieve desired outcomes with certainty. Their approach covers all facets of intervention through a structured methodology encompassing creative conceptualization (Envisionment), building ownership (Energizing), developing skills (Enabling), hardcore implementation (Execution), and institutionalizing changes (Evaluation, Enhancement, Establishing).
key_use_cases: Integrating business strategy with individual performance
Designing and implementing adaptive organizational cultures
Co-creating fractal structures for organizational scaling
Building real ownership and alignment among senior leaders
Driving sustainable impactful change within organizations

Improvement in organizational performance through aligned culture
Enhancement of agility and collaborative decision-making among senior leaders

Building real ownership among senior leaders leading to superior levels of Trust, Alignment, Capability and Joyful Resilience
scalability_features: Co-creating Fractal Structures for Scaling with Soul
